item.title: [Need Help] Dung Points that scale to your level?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sir Jay:

c.dungPoints += c.playerLevel[3]; or whatever your dungeoneering level field is

Or you could make it a bit more complex and whatnot…
You should add variables to track what the player does in the dung. Like how many deaths, monster kills, etc etc.
You could use those to calculate your dungeon score.

[code=java]
c.dungPoints += calculateFinalScore();

private int calculateFinalScore() {
int points = c.playerLevel[23];// or whatever your player level id is.
points = ((points * c.getDungeon().monstersKilled) * Server.SERVER_BONUS) / c.getDungeon().playerDeaths;
return points;
}[/code]
This is just a mock up, of course.

Read full topic
item.source: [Need Help] Dung Points that scale to your level?

item.title: [Need Help] Dung Points that scale to your level?
item.dc:creator: @gwinter gwinter
item.description:
@gwinter wrote:

Trying to figure out a code so that the amount of dungeoneering points you get will scale to your level. For example, a player with dungeoneering level 1 will get 1 pt per dung, and a player with 99 dungeoneering will get 99 pts per dungeon. I messed around with a few codes but ultimately came up shorthanded. Here’s what I have:

case 375: if(c.Zammy > 0) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3092, 3485, 0); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.dungPoints += 30; c.lastsummon = 0; c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.playerLevel[3] = 99; c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(400*c.playerLevel[24], 24); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); c.sendMessage("<col=16711680>Congratulations! You have finished the dungeon.</col>"); c.sendMessage("<col=16711680>You received some experience and points.</col>"); // ADD DUNGEON POINTS c.Zammy = 0; } else { c.sendMessage("<col=16711680>You need to Kill the boss to escape the dungeon!</col>"); } break;
I tried to enter a code similar to that of the experience code, but it didn’t work out.

Read full topic
item.source: [Need Help] Dung Points that scale to your level?
